entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then light in the afternoon. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 02:50 AM EST Thursday 05 January 2023
